name: Assets
description: Retrieve Assets Data from Asset Packs.

return.description: in the format [{Name, Path, Author, Version}, ...]

static_functions.name: GetAssetPacks
static_functions.description: Gets a list containing information about all loaded Asset Packs

parameters.name: asset_pack_path
parameters.description: The Asset Pack path to get the assets
